body_html: Wanted to report that I've run into the same issue when upgrading from tensorflow 1.6 to 1.10.1 [building from source, we also have a not-very-typical installation of python modules (including numpy). I haven't found a way to force my PYTHONPATH to be used (with --action_env or otherwise)

body: Wanted to report that I've run into the same issue when upgrading from tensorflow 1.6 to 1.10.1 [building from source, we also have a not-very-typical installation of python modules (including numpy). I haven't found a way to force my PYTHONPATH to be used (with --action_env or otherwise)
